changeSet.author: mat_dev_user
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE TRANSACTION_AUDIT_LOG ( ID varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY_ID varchar(40) NULL, SECONDARY_ID varchar(40) NULL, ACTIVITY_TYPE varchar(40) NOT NULL, USER_ID varchar(40) NOT NULL, TIMESTAMP timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ADDL_INFO varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ID) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
